title: Elegant Maroochydore Beachside Apartments with Tranquil Pool, Jacuzzi & BBQ Facilities
description: Experience the laidback charms of the Sunshine Coast at this collection of seaside apartments, mere moments from the surf-friendly beaches of Maroochydore. Soak up the gorgeous Pacific Ocean views, unwind in the oversized living areas of your private apartments, go for a swim in the glimmering outdoor pool or simply relax in the jacuzzi. The hotel is an impeccable base to explore the vibrant Ocean Street dining district and eclectic beach shops, while also remaining within easy reach of the iconic Australia Zoo. After a day of exploration, cook up a storm with a rooftop barbecue feast.

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Sunshine Coast
title: Contemporary Sunshine Coast Escape with Rooftop Pool

Wander through the national parks, discover secret swimming holes and endless stretches of beach, before returning to your modern room in the heart of Maroochydore City's CBD.
